entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON

CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
